name: Sacred Lace Hooded Cloak
description: Custom made Black Leather Form Fitting Coat with attached hood. Detachable oversized theatrical sleeves in faux leather and lace. Sacred Geometry back piece detail. Neo Victorian laced closures. Ruffled perimeter and bustled tails. Lace up sides for greater fit. Piece Looks equally great laced or left open. Sizing is small/medium fairly adjustable. 32”waist ; 15” across the shoulders; 13” neck circumference/ 4” height ; 26” oversized long sleeves with 21” opening around the top of the shoulder and room for a 13” bicep. This piece has small buckles with leather straps,  for sleeve attachment. Shown worn with a simple black dress underneath; and without.

name: 1940s Dandy Dennis Suit | Vintage 40s Grey, Black, Red and White Wool Tweed Pin Striped Two Piece Set Jacket and Pants | Size 40 Medium
Deerskin Ranger jerkin
description:
This is a leather jerkin/ jacket made out of 3-5 ounce mule deer leather.

Mule deer is slightly heavier weight than regular deerskin, but still extremely soft and supple. 

Each jerkin is closed via braided ties in front, and the size is adjustable via lace closure on the sides.

Each jerkin has a back seam along the waist line and an angled seam in front. All of the edges are hemmed, and the side lace closures are reinforced with a second layer of leather and metal eyelets.

We have two sizes available, the S/M size adjusts to fit size 36-42 chest. The L/XL will fit 42-48

The Jerkin's are made  37" in the front and back. If you would like yours longer or shorter, let me know and we will adjust the size.

There are 6 standard colors, but many other options, feel free to message me if you have something particular in mind.

Mule deer are a range animal, therefore their hides tend to have a number of imperfections, scratches, scars, bullet holes etc. We will do our best to pick unmarred pieces when making each jerkin, but there will be at least a few imperfections. Keep this in mind when ordering. 

As always, customization is available. Feel free to message me with any questions.

name: Napoleonic Military (Regency/French Revolution) Coat and Hat Set
description:
Napoleonic Military (Regency/French Revolution) Coat and Hat Set  (Navy and White with Red Collar)

SIZE LARGE IN STOCK AND READY FOR IMMEDIATE SHIPPING! (Jacket Size 44)

PLEASE SUBMIT MEASUREMENTS PRIOR TO ORDERING A CUSTOM MAKE.

USPS Priority Shipping - In stock items typically ship 3-5 days after order is placed - once payment has been cleared and the order fully processed.

PAYMENT PLAN AVAILABLE

Beautifully crafted in lightweight cotton twill, and fully-lined (including sleeves), our Napoleon Bonaparte (1769 - 1821) costume  - Version I - is as commanding as the man who inspired it!

***ALSO SIMILAR TO THE NAVAL JACKET WORN BY KILLIAN JONES/CAPTAIN HOOK ON SEASON 3, EPISODE 5 OF "ONCE UPON A TIME."

Set against a crisp navy background, and lavishly adorned with gold trim and military-style brass buttons, the jacket is crafted according to traditional 18th century design specifications, making it the perfect addition to your Recency wardrobe. Design features include a cutaway waist and red contrast detailing at the collar, cuffs, and lower portions of the front and back. Discreetly-placed snap tape provides invisible closure along the center front.

All seams are straight stitched AND over-locked for increased durability and comfort, with no raw edges. Dry cleaning and/or spot cleaning recommended. Cool iron.

The classically-shaped bicorne hat is fully-lined and constructed in sturdy, black craft felt. Gold braid and a tri-colored ribbon cockade add style and authenticity to the iconic silhouette.

The Napoleonic Military (Regency/French Revolution) Coat and Hat Set is a custom item and is designed to accommodate chest sizes between 38 - 48 inches (approximate).

Current processing times for custom items is 3-4 weeks, and a form for submitting measurements will be emailed to the purchaser upon receipt of payment.



*All sales are final. No refunds, returns, or exchanges will be accepted.

name: Isadora Robe in Amaranth Red
description:
Hand-crafted in New Orleans, the Leslie Courreges Isadora Robe marries minimalism and ornamentation. The cocoon shape is formed by bias-cut panels, creating a billowing, rounded back. Dolman style sleeves create a dramatic, sweeping silhouette.

Two hidden slits provide flexibility, allowing you to wear the coordinating belt or a contrasting one.

Robe shell is Halston 100% Polyester Crepe in Amaranth Red. Robe lining is 100% Polyester Chiffon in Poppy Red. 

Grace is 5'7", a dress size 4, and wears a size S.

Care: Dry Clean Only

---

Named for visionary dancer Isadora Duncan, whose innovative dance style dramatically contrasted the popular styles of the early twentieth century, the Isadora Robe’s style and fabric are built upon movement and shape. Known as “The Mother of Dance,” Duncan eschewed traditional mores and morality. The Isadora Resort 2019 collection features bold colors and prints, complementing Duncan’s “You were once wild here. Don't let them tame you.” lifestyle and values.
